_header: For that power haven not we
_description: Henry Lovelich, The Holy Grail — 23,932 lines in couplets

CamCCC80.First Lines:
ffor that power haven no wehim hol to maken In non
                    degre…
CamCCC80.Last Lines:
…And that an Ende there Offen myhte beNow goode lord graunt me
                    for Charyte
